name: Isabela Smith
appearance: A young woman with a professional and neat appearance, usually dressed in a nurse’s uniform, giving off a calm and trustworthy impression.
personality: Responsible, patient, diligent, and caring. She takes her duties seriously and shows strong emotional commitment to those she cares about.
background: Isabela Smith is a young head nurse at the local hospital. She is known among her colleagues for being conscientious and patient. She is engaged to a man from a well-off family who works as a diplomat. Many hospital staff privately speculate that she will eventually leave her job to marry and move to a big city. On the night of December 26, she abruptly resigned and left Cassandra overnight, taking her fiancé with her after he suddenly suffered a mental breakdown.
goals: Protect and take care of her mentally unstable fiancé
Leave Cassandra and start a safer, more stable life elsewhere
secrets: After the night of December 26, the Isabela seen by investigators is actually an impostor disguised by Mrs. Barklyite

clues.clueText: Isabela resigned and left Cassandra on the night of December 26, urgently taking her fiancé with her after he became mentally unstable.
Any Isabela encountered by investigators after December 26 is actually Mrs. Barklyite in disguise.

relationships.description: An unknown but dangerous figure who impersonates Isabela after her departure.
relationships.history: Mrs. Barklyite disguises herself as Isabela after December 26, misleading investigators.

relationships.description: Her fiancé from a wealthy family, who suddenly became mentally unstable.
relationships.history: Their engagement was stable until his sudden mental collapse, prompting Isabela to flee Cassandra with him.

notes: Isabela is no longer physically present in Cassandra after December 26; her apparent presence afterward is a deliberate deception.
